title: Critical Play Literacy-Based Teacher Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on designing language education through playful elements in asynchronous classes using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can design language lessons that promote students' critical thinking through play-based activities with over 80% accuracy.
Learners develop and evaluate three or more educational scenarios incorporating creative play elements within given constraints.
Learners can improve and revise their design proposals three or more times through peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
